bug.author: yxftju
bug.summary: cannot login from LAN and WAN at the same time
bug.description: I notice in some previous issue , some method has been provide to make the system could be login from LAN <denchmark-link:https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/cvat/issues/1093>#1093</denchmark-link> or WAN <denchmark-link:https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/cvat/issues/1095>#1095</denchmark-link> . But I found that if I set the system login from WAN for my peers, I could not even login from LAN for task managent . Can any one provide an solution ?

comments.comment: The issue should be resolved by service. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yxftju>@yxftju</denchmark-link> feel free to reopen if you have questions related to this issue.
